title: E139 FROM PRISONER TO BILLIONAIRE: STEVE MADDEN - IMPAULSIVE EP. 139
itunes:title: FROM PRISONER TO BILLIONAIRE: STEVE MADDEN - IMPAULSIVE EP. 139
description:
Steve Madden is an American fashion designer, businessman, and convicted felon. You may have seen him portrayed in The Wolf of Wall Street, or perhaps your sister has a pair of his world famous shoes... in this episode, Steve speaks on his notorious relationship with Jordan Belfort, his multi-million dollar lawsuits, and how he channeled his addictive personally from drugs to business.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
